description:
While launching an instance, the instance name provided in GUI/horizon doesn't match with the hostname inside the guest. 

Steps to create:

1. Launch an instance and specify an instance name
2. After instance is launched, loging to the instance using ssh and check the $hostname.
title: Instance host name is not same as the specified name

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~prem-karat

comments.content: How is your instance configured?  Did you use cloud-init?  According to http://docs.openstack.org/trunk/openstack-compute/admin/content/user-data.html, "This cloud-init user data example sets the hostname and the FQDN".
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~thang-pham

comments.content: You should check you cloud-init and nova-metadata-api's configuration.
